languages.text: Devastating Attack also reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −7% and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.
languages.original_text: Сокрушительный удар также уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} цели на 7% и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} на 10 до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Devastating Attack also reduces the target's armour by −15% and Toughness by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.
Devastating Attack also reduces the target's armour by −15% and Toughness by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.

Devastating Attack also reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −7% and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.

languages.text: 毁灭攻势还会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低7%，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}降低10点，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果不可叠加。
languages.original_text: Devastating Attack also reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −7% and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}毁灭{/g}攻势还会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低15%，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}降低10点，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果不可叠加。

languages.text: Ataque devastador también reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del objetivo un −7 % y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} en −10 hasta el final del combate. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Devastating Attack also reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −7% and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Ataque {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastador{/g} también reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del objetivo un −15 % y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} en −10 hasta el final del combate. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text: 壊滅攻撃を使用すると、戦闘終了時までターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を-7%、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}を-10減少させる。累積しない。
languages.original_text: Devastating Attack also reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −7% and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: また、{g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}壊滅{/g}攻撃を使用すると戦闘終了時までターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を-15%、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}体力{/g}を-10減少させる。この効果はスタックしない。

languages.text: Сокрушительный удар также уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} цели на 7% и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} на 10 до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется.
languages.original_text: Devastating Attack also reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −7% and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Сокрушительный удар также уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} цели на 15% и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} на 10 до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется.
Сокрушительный удар также уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} цели на 15% и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} на 10 до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется.

languages.text: Verheerender Angriff reduziert beim Ziel bis zum Ende des Kampfes auch die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} um −7 % und die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} um −10. Kann nicht gestacked werden.
languages.original_text: Devastating Attack also reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −7% and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Verheerender Angriff{/g} reduziert beim Ziel bis zum Ende des Kampfes ebenfalls {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} um −15 % und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} um −10. Stapelt sich nicht.

languages.text: Attaque Dévastatrice réduit également l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de la cible de 7 % et son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} de 10 jusqu'à la fin du combat. Non cumulable.
languages.original_text: Devastating Attack also reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −7% and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Attaque {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Dévastatrice{/g} réduit également l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de la cible de -15 % et sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} de -10 jusqu'à la fin du combat. Non cumulable.
